title: CorPower Ocean to lead €30 million wave energy scaling project
description: CorPower Ocean will lead the €30 million POWER-Farm EU Project to validate wave farm technology in UK waters, supported by Horizon Europe funding.
content: CorPower Ocean will lead the €30 million POWER-Farm EU Project to validate wave farm technology in UK waters, supported by Horizon Europe funding.
